channel.title: Need help with my forums for my server!L00K
channel.description:
hi i need help on forums i want my forums to have this i took this from enougher forum...i want the stars
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/6755/codenp3.png[/img][/URL]
But mine looks like this how do i change it please help me!!

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2008, 12:24:21 AM[/size][hr]See i want the stars

item.title: Need help with my forums for my server!L00K

item.description:

You could start with the basics?

SMF

VBULLETIN

If your using smfforfree or ipbfree im not even going to go there, there pathetic
